results.title: Sudden cardiac death with clozapine and sertraline combination.
results.text_hl: His medication regimen included @CHEMICAL_Clozapine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003024 @@@clozapine@@@ 100 mg twice daily (started 4 y prior to his @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@), @CHEMICAL_Risperidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D018967 @@@risperidone@@@ 3 mg twice daily, @CHEMICAL_Sertraline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020280 @@@sertraline@@@ 200 mg once daily, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ 50 mg twice daily, and @CHEMICAL_Lorazepam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008140 @@@lorazepam@@@ 0.5 mg four times daily.
